derivation.yuyuan_name: 18th cent.: from French, from Spanish and Portuguese cachalote, from cachola 'big head'

means.word_mean: 1. large whale with a large cavity in the head containing spermaceti and oil; also a source of ambergris

auth_sentence.content: The sperm whale is also known as the cachalot.
